title: Receipt Layout Schema
description: A schema for receipt layout kind for Customer Controlled Config service

effectiveDate.description:
The date when this layout should be applied, if present. It is up to the integrator
to make sure that a current layout exists in the final system, if a layout has a
future effectiveDate set.\
The current date will be used if left out and layout will take effect immediately.

ImageType.description: An image that can be referenced from Sections.

Section.description: A Section contains image or textual data.

type.description:
Each Section has a type that determines its placement on the actual
receipt. Headers are placed above receipt line items and Footers are
placed below receipt line items.

ImageIdType.description: An id to a supplied image.

ImageProperty.description:
A property for a image.\
Additional custom properties can be added via '*additionalProperties*' field.

suppressOnActiveReceipt.description: Determines if this section is to be hidden on the currently active receipt presentation.

height.description:
The height in pixels, for the image.\
E.g. an image would have a height property determining the height of the resulting image.

width.description:
The width in pixels, for the image.\
E.g. an image would have a width property determining the width of the resulting image.

type.description:
Each Section has a type that determines its placement on the actual
receipt. Headers are placed above receipt line items and Footers are
placed below receipt line items.

value.description: A textual value that is treated as simple strings.

TextSectionProperty.description:
A property for a textual section.\
Additional custom properties can be added via '*additionalProperties*' field.

suppressOnActiveReceipt.description: Determines if this section is to be hidden on the currently active receipt presentation.

AlignmentTypeEnum.description: Configures the textual content alignment within the receipt.

FontStyleEnum.description: Configures the textual content style within the receipt.
